scd.successSubtitle: We will contact you as soon as we process your request.
scd.inquiryAddSuccess: The product has been successfully added to your inquiry basket.
scd.inquiryUpdateQuantity: The product quantity was successfully adjusted.
scd.inquiryRemoveSuccess: The product has been successfully removed from your inquiry basket.
scd.inquiryFormSuccess: Your request has been successfully transmitted. We'll get back to you!
scd.inquirySendText: By submitting this form, all inquiry items will be sent to us. We will then contact you promptly.
scd.missingEmailError: Missing sender email address in the plugin configuration. Please enter a valid email address in the plugin configuration.
